Direct Known Subclasses:
JoseBuilder, JwkBuilder
class KeyReferenceBuilder<B extends KeyReferenceBuilder<B>> extends CertificateReferenceBuilder<B> implements WebKeyReference.Builder<B>
Common base class for JSON web security object builders.
